product_name: Backpacker's Pantry Organic Yakisoba Noodles - Single Serving
long_description: The crisp and delicious Backpacker's Pantry Organic Yakisoba Noodles meal puts a spin on traditional Japanese fried noodles with vegetables. Meal requires cooking; makes one 12 oz. serving. To prepare, remove oil pack from pouch and set aside; add 1 cup of boiling water to contents and stir thoroughly, making sure noodles are fully submerged; let sit for 10 min. Pour olive oil followed by pouch contents into a skillet; cook over medium heat, stirring occasionally for 5 - 10 min. until noodles are fried; serve immediately. Nutrition facts displayed here and on packaging may differ; information on packaging reflects actual contents. *Discount will be applied when you check out; offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
short_description: The crisp and delicious Backpacker's Pantry Organic Yakisoba Noodles meal puts a spin on traditional Japanese fried noodles with vegetables.
